resource.title: Photogammetry in Book of the Dead
resource.body: !format (( [https://youtu.be/DDsRfbfnC_A][Book of the Dead] is a demo of Unity's realtime graphics capabilities. This blog post by CG and VFX artist [https://blogs.unity3d.com/author/zdravkop/][Zdravko Pavlov] goes into some of the techniques used to create its breathtaking photorealistic assets and VFX. Focusing primarily on workflows to create very high-quality environment assets from still photographs, the article gives great insight into how photogammetry can be used in a game asset pipeline. )) (( Even if it's not immediately useful due to lack of experience or equipment, definitely give it a read to learn more about modern asset creation techniques! ))
